name: ListBrand

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

from.description: The first page of the interval of the brand list.

to.description: The last page of the interval of the brand list.

orderBy.description: The order that the list is displayed. You can select `name`, or `updated_at` to select the order criteria. Then you can add `,` , `asc` or `desc` to define the brands order.

$ul: **_metadata**: Information about the organization and exhibition of the brand list.
**from**: The first page of the interval of the brand list.
**orderBy**: The order that the list is displayed. You can select `name`, or `updated_at` to select the order criteria. Then you can add `,` , `asc` or `desc` to define the brands order.
**to**: The last page of the interval of the brand list.
**total**: Total of brands on the list.
**data**: List with information about the store's brands.
